means: （指愤怒、仇恨、敌意等）难和解的

sentence.Network_en: Young and old saw in him an implacable opponent of apartheid.
sentence.Network_cn: 无论老少都看出他是种族隔离制度的坚决反对者。

sentence.Network_en: The move has won the implacable opposition of many economists.
sentence.Network_cn: 该提案遭到了许多经济学家的坚决反对。

sentence.Network_en: He knew that Karl could be an implacable foe.
sentence.Network_cn: 他明白卡尔可能会成为他的死敌.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 词根记忆 - 豆丁网 ... depict v. 描述，描写 implacable a. 难宽恕的，难和解的，执拗的 complacency n. 满足，安心（全部平静安心）.
satirical 好讽刺的, 爱挖苦人的implacable 不缓和的, 不安静的placable 易抚慰的
词根记忆 - 豆丁网 ... depict v. 描述，描写 implacable a. 难宽恕的，难和解的，执拗的 complacency n. 满足，安心（全部平静安心）.
读阿婆小说英文版之SAD CYPRESS-序 ... +smug 自以为是的 +implacable 难平息的 +wraith 幽灵，骨瘦如柴的人.

list.abs: with implacable sweetness 能共享奇妙的甜蜜 If each day a flower climbs 如果你迎向我的红唇 up to your lips to seek me, 每天绽若鲜花 Ah my love, ah.
“死”字有那些解释？_百度知道 ... 死点[ backwater] 死对头[ implacable enemy] 死而复生[ wake up from death].
implacable 不缓和的implacably 无法和解地implacental 无胎盘动物
impish 顽童似的implacability 不缓和implacable 不缓和的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin implacabilis, from in- 'not' + placabilis (see placable)

entry.tran: 不能安抚的;无法平息的;毫不妥协的
entry.def: If you say that someone is implacable, you mean that they have very strong feelings of hostility or disapproval which nobody can change.

example.ex: ...the threat of invasion by a ruthless and implacable enemy...
example.tran: 残暴无情的敌人发出的侵略威胁

example.ex: The move has won the implacable opposition of many economists.
example.tran: 该提案遭到了许多经济学家的坚决反对。

auth_sentence.content: A...lonely child, convinced of the world's implacable hostility.
auth_sentence.res_content: A...lonely child, convinced of the world's implacable hostility.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A...lonely child, convinced of the world's implacable hostility.

auth_sentence.content: Rosenberg stared helplessly at the implacable sequence that came next.
auth_sentence.res_content: Rosenberg stared helplessly at the implacable sequence that came next.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Rosenberg stared helplessly at the implacable sequence that came next.

auth_sentence.content: Every step forward is contested with implacable fervour by the extremists.
auth_sentence.res_content: Every step forward is contested with implacable fervour by the extremists.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Every step forward is contested with implacable fervour by the extremists.

stems_affixes.word_buile: com全部+plac平静+ent……的→全部平静→无进一步的要→自满的
com全部+plais=plac平静+ant……的→让[别人]平静舒服→讨好的
im不+placable易平静的→adj.难以满足的,难平息的
plac平静+able能……的→adj.易平息的,易和解的
plac平静+ebo表示药品→平静的药
